__TOC__

* Activists of the Hungarian Ubuntu LoCo promoted Ubuntu at the Hegyalja Festival (a rock festival at Tokaj): <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu.hu/node/19873|More info (in Hungarian)]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://galgonet.dyndns.org/v/balok_bulik/hegyalja_2010/free_software_ubuntu_firefox_openoffice/|Photos]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pF7WRKOnf7w|YouTube Video]]</nowiki>
* We started to organize a LoCo trip to the Szeged Zoo to observe a real lynx and meerkats. The trip will be on 7th August: http://ubuntu.hu/node/19795
* We translated the 36th issue of Full Circle Magazine into Hungarian: http://ubuntu.hu/node/19764
* We promoted the Ubuntu Developer Week on our LoCo site: http://ubuntu.hu/node/19608
* We posted about Ubuntu and Kubuntu Maverick Meerkat Alpha 2 on our LoCo site: http://ubuntu.hu/node/19492, http://ubuntu.hu/node/19499
* We continued our work on the Hungarian Ubuntu Education Project: http://edu.ubuntu.hu
* We did various translation-related tasks
